synopsis.text: Kai, a boy raised in humble beginnings as the son of a prostitute, finds solace and passion in an abandoned piano hidden deep within the forest near his home. Meanwhile, Shuhei, born into a family of renowned pianists, has been surrounded by the melodies and grandeur of the instrument since his infancy. Their contrasting backgrounds and experiences with the piano intertwine their fates, as they embark on a journey that transforms both their lives and the music they create together. This heartwarming tale explores the power of a shared love for music and the unbreakable bond it can forge between two souls.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
